issue.title: Dev services check property value existence with expression expansion
Doc - Do not start Keycloak Dev Services when test resource is around

labels.name: area/docstyle
labels.description: issues related for manual docstyle review

body:
This is due to: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/41326

I added a note in the migration guide: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-3.13#dev-services-startup-detection-change

I also updated the doc: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/42393

I think that's the best we can do here. Thanks for the report and the reproducer.
